Generation II.Gold: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
Generation II.Silver: If it smells something enticing, it dashes headlong off to find the source of the aroma.
Generation II.Crystal: It uses the tip of its nose to dig for food. Its nose is so tough that even frozen ground poses no problem.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) If it smells something enticing, it dashes headlong off to find the source of the aroma. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This Pok é mon occasionally roots out hot springs.

Generation III.LeafGreen: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
